title_full: CMOBOPS01-BP01 Define end-to-end KPIs and metrics for a connected mobility platform
title: Define end-to-end KPIs and metrics for a connected mobility platform
description: Collecting key metrics, logs, and trace information from all parts of your connected mobility platform will give you end to end visibility across the solution. It can decrease the Mean Time to Detect (MTTD), Mean Time to Repair (MTTR), and Mean Time to Restore Service (MTRS) by allowing you to detect issues quickly, and troubleshoot and debug with precision.
outcome: End-to-end visibility across the connected mobility platform with business, application, and infrastructure KPIs mapped to metrics from tools like CloudWatch

title_full: CMOBOPS02-BP01 Implement an observability data lake that aggregates telemetry from all connected mobility components
title: Implement an observability data lake that aggregates telemetry from all connected mobility components
description: Validate that all components of the connected mobility platform are able to send the telemetry data (logs, traces, and metrics) to the observability data lake. Implement transaction correlation IDs in those records to trace the transaction across multiple services.
outcome: Centralized observability data lake with correlated telemetry from vehicles, cloud services, and applications enabling root cause analysis

title_full: CMOBOPS02-BP02 Set up real-time monitoring and alerting capabilities to detect anomalies promptly
title: Set up real-time monitoring and alerting capabilities to detect anomalies promptly
description: Use Amazon CloudWatch to store logs and to monitor key metrics such as vehicle status, telemetry, or network connectivity. Implement custom log analysis solutions and when predefined thresholds or anomalies are detected, CloudWatch Alarms can cause notifications via Amazon SNS or perform automated actions using AWS Lambda functions.
outcome: Real-time anomaly detection with automated alerting and response capabilities

title_full: CMOBOPS02-BP03 Implement predictive analytics and proactive operations
title: Implement predictive analytics and proactive operations
description: Use predictive analytics to analyze historical data to identify patterns and trends that can predict potential component failures. Use ML services like Amazon DevOps Guru to detect abnormal operating patterns and extend predictive capability by developing ML algorithms using Amazon SageMaker AI.
outcome: Proactive issue detection and prevention using machine learning and predictive analytics

title_full: CMOBOPS02-BP04 Implement robust remote diagnostic capabilities
title: Implement robust remote diagnostic capabilities
description: Develop comprehensive diagnostic algorithms that can accurately identify potential issues. Real-time data collected from in-vehicle system is continuously analyzed to detect anomalies and raise timely alerts using services such as AWS IoT Core and AWS Lambda.
outcome: Remote diagnostic capabilities enabling efficient identification and resolution of vehicle issues

title_full: CMOBOPS02-BP05 Provide remote access for troubleshooting purposes
title: Provide remote access for troubleshooting purposes
description: Authorized support personnel can remotely access in-vehicle systems to expedite troubleshooting. Implement secure communication protocols using end user consent, VPNs or encrypted remote access tools to protect data privacy and prevent unauthorized access.
outcome: Secure remote access capabilities for authorized troubleshooting while protecting data privacy

title_full: CMOBOPS03-BP01 Validate the system in a non-production environment that has feature equality with production
title: Validate the system in a non-production environment that has feature equality with production
description: Use digital twin concepts to create a vehicle simulator to introduce common failure scenarios and test subsystem behavior. Leverage vehicle observability data collected over time to generate machine learning models and perform predictive testing. Perform real world tests for connectivity, security, navigation, entertainment, data collection and analytics.
outcome: Comprehensive testing environment with feature parity to production including vehicle simulators and real-world test scenarios

title_full: CMOBOPS04-BP01 Leverage microservices architecture for connected mobility platform
title: Leverage microservices architecture for connected mobility platform
description: The microservices architecture streamlines the development, deployment, scaling, and maintenance of the entire connected mobility platform. Each microservice can be independently scaled and deployed with different disaster recovery strategies based on their individual RTO and RPO.
outcome: Agile, scalable platform with independent microservices enabling faster development and deployment

title_full: CMOBOPS04-BP02 Implement API-first architecture to facilitate the exchange of data and services
title: Implement API-first architecture to facilitate the exchange of data and services
description: API operations help in agile development and faster feature-to-market by providing clear guidelines, enabling modular development, and supporting collaboration with external stakeholders. The API-first approach helps to easily extend the platform to support multiple model years of vehicles with backward compatibility.
outcome: API-first platform enabling extensibility, backward compatibility, and third-party integration

title: Implement DevOps automation
description: Incorporate DevOps automation to improve productivity, enhance developer experience, and improve quality of feature releases. Implement a self-service developer portal with pattern-based software templates, adopt CI/CD pipelines, and automate testing to simulate scenarios and real-world conditions.
outcome: Automated development and deployment workflows improving productivity and quality
